Pre-Game Insights: India began their Asia Cup 2022 tournament with a thrilling win over arch-rivals Pakistan.

Virat Kohli and Ravindra Jadeja remained the top scorers for the Indian team with 35 runs each, while Hardik Pandya proved to be the difference with his unbeaten 33 runs off 17 balls at the end, guiding team India to a 5-wicket win in the last over.
KL Rahul, who was out for a golden duck against Pakistan, would be hoping to get back his form against a relatively weaker opponent.
Indian bowlers impressed with their performance against Pakistan, especially Bhuvneshwar Kumar & Hardik Pandya.
Hong Kong's captain Nizakat Khan has been the top scorer for his team in T20Is this year, scoring 249 runs in 8 innings with three fifties to his name.
Babar Hayat has scored 217 runs this year with two fifties while striking at 134.78.
Ehsan Khan has grabbed 18 wickets in 8 matches this year, the highest for a Hong Kong bowler this year.
All-rounder Aizaz Khan has picked up 12 wickets in 8 matches this year while Mohammad Ghazanfar has managed 10 wickets this year.
